title: Experiences
subtitle: My formation
details1: This course of study has allowed me to become passionate about the world of programming and acquire skills in some web programming languages such as HTML, CSS (pure CSS and frameworks like Tailwind and Bootstrap), JavaScript, Typescript, React, Angular and NodeJs. In addition to these languages that are the basis of web development, I have learned to use tools such as Git, GitHub, and Netlify that help to work in teams and manage projects more efficiently.
details2: After graduating from a school for surveyors, I worked as such for 6 years. I started working as a clerk in a technical office until being a site manager for an important company in the Brescian construction industry. These experiences formed me and allowed me to develop soft skills such as problem solving, attention to detail, ability to work in a team, manage groups of people, be autonomous and above all to be flexible.
